title: Test 8
description: Test issue with 4 no-op phases to validate Kanban board visualization and card transitions

phases.title: Environment Check
phases.description: Verify the project root and .tiki/ directory exist. Confirm state.json is present and valid JSON.
phases.verification: Project root contains package.json and .tiki/state.json exists as valid JSON

phases.title: Dependency Audit
phases.description: List installed dependencies without modifying anything. Check that pnpm-workspace.yaml exists and node_modules are present.
phases.verification: pnpm-workspace.yaml exists and node_modules directory is present

phases.title: Structure Validation
phases.description: Confirm expected directories (packages/shared, packages/framework, apps/desktop) are present with their package.json files.
phases.verification: All three package directories exist with package.json files

phases.title: Summary Report
phases.description: Echo a completion summary to stdout listing all checks that passed.
